item.title: Approximately Pareto-optimal Solutions for Bi-Objective k-Clustering
item.description: This paper presents novel algorithms for approximating Pareto-optimal solutions to bi-objective k-clustering problems, achieving provable approximation guarantees and demonstrating effectiveness throu…
